text: Koraa, ‘ma'i akasamandala arau prthiraira srasta allahaka erai anaka abhibharaka raupe grahana karaima neki? Teraemi ahara pradana karae kintu te'omka ahara pradana karaa nahaya’. Koraa, ‘niscaya moka adesa karaa haiche ye, yisakale ichalama grahana karaiche maye'i yena sihamtara majata prathama ha'om, (moka arau adesa karaa haiche ye) tumi ketiya'o musbaraikasakalara antarbhukta naha’ba’
